vocabInfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Nephus(?), only mentioned at Ezr.2.50; also called Nephisim (Qere, KJV, NIV: Nephussim) at Ezr.2.50;
Group of ne.phush.sim (נְפִישְׁסִים, נפיסים "Nephushesim" H5300)
§ Nephisim = "scattered spices"
a family of exiles who returned with Zerubbabel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: jefe de familia; sirvientes del templo; post exílico
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
尼普心 这个專有名詞在原文的意思是 "擴散的香味"
隨所羅巴伯一起回歸的家族之一 (是寫型與讀型的混合字型)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
尼普心 这个专有名词在原文的意思是 "扩散的香味"
随所罗巴伯一起回归的家族之一 (是写型与读型的混合字型)
